title: AncillaryRoleEnum
description: Defines the enumerated values to specify the ancillary roles to the transaction. The product is agnostic to the actual parties involved in the transaction, with the party references abstracted away from the product definition and replaced by the AncillaryRoleEnum. The AncillaryRoleEnum can then be positioned in the product and the AncillaryParty type, which is positioned outside of the product definition, allows the AncillaryRoleEnum to be associated with an actual party reference.

oneOf.title: CalculationAgentFallback
oneOf.description: Specifies the party responsible for deciding the fallback rate.

oneOf.title: CalculationAgentIndependent
oneOf.description: Specifies the party responsible for performing calculation agent duties as defined in the applicable product definition.

oneOf.title: CalculationAgentMandatoryEarlyTermination
oneOf.description: Specifies the party responsible for performing calculation agent duties associated with an mandatory early termination.

oneOf.title: CalculationAgentOptionalEarlyTermination
oneOf.description: Specifies the party responsible for performing calculation agent duties associated with an optional early termination.

oneOf.title: DisruptionEventsDeterminingParty
oneOf.description: Specifies the party which determines additional disruption events.

oneOf.title: ExerciseNoticeReceiverPartyCancelableProvision
oneOf.description: Specifies the party to which notice of a cancelable provision exercise should be given.

oneOf.title: ExerciseNoticeReceiverPartyExtendibleProvision
oneOf.description: Specifies the party to which notice of a extendible provision exercise should be given.

oneOf.title: ExerciseNoticeReceiverPartyManual
oneOf.description: Specifies the party to which notice of a manual exercise should be given.

oneOf.title: ExerciseNoticeReceiverPartyOptionalEarlyTermination
oneOf.description: Specifies the party to which notice of a optional early termination exercise should be given.

oneOf.title: ExtraordinaryDividendsParty
oneOf.description: Specifies the party which determines if dividends are extraordinary in relation to normal levels.

oneOf.title: PredeterminedClearingOrganizationParty
oneOf.description: Specifies the clearing organization (CCP, DCO) which the trade should be cleared.
